ing: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (regular or 25% Lower Sodium)
4 cups hot cooked medium egg noodles
des: "Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup flavors a creamy sauce that is mixed with tuna, egg noodles and peas, topped with a crunchy bread crumb topping and baked toÂ perfection."
ins:
Stir soup, milk, peas, tuna and noodles in 3-quart casserole.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 30 minutes or until hot. Stir.
Mix bread crumbs with butter in bowl and sprinkle over tuna mixture. Bake for 5 minutes more.
